author: pete the
comment: This was a great app for a while but it no longer tells the correct temperature. WeatherBug on my Droid Turbo says it's 95 in NYC but on my Moto 360, it says it's 79. Slightly off! :( It is also displaying the moon even though it is 4:30 in the afternoon.
title: Used to work but stopped.

author: Hi Ke
comment: For a watch app that's made for weather, its not working.  I spent $$ for the pro but should have reviewed these comments before.  The weather is stuck at 100 degrees.  Had almost everything I wanted.....but stuck watching incorrect weather.

author: M Hair
comment: "error" failure to connect with google play. Device: Samsung Gear S.  Im looking for digital watch that has battery meter and temperature. Thought this was perfect. Fix bugs or offer suggestions and I'll be HAPPY!!
title: DON'T WORK

author: Richard Wisti
comment: Paid for full version. Forecasts stopped updating after a week or two. Tried all the recommended fixes: uninstalling/reinstalling, resetting my phone, etc. Bummer it doesn't work for me (Samsung Gear Live). There aren't enough Android Wear forecast options out there (that work).
title: 75% functional

author: Kelly Rhodes
comment: This could be a nice watch face except the weather is way wrong. It says it's 100 degrees with a high of 999 degrees. It's 60 outside. I'm using the Yahoo weather to pull it from. Too bad. Looks like app hasn't been updated in almost a year. Google needs to pull this from the store.
title: Temp is WAY off

author: Carl Graser
comment: Works great on my LG G Watch. But I paid for Premium version and the free background look better I'm starting to think I got ripped off. Would be 5 stars if premium had better wallpapers and could keep the screen on longer

author: Codrin Oprea
comment: The fact that a weather app charges 1.41 dollars to display the weather  BUT doesn't show the temperature properly renders the weather app unless... I doubt I'll get a refund... Unfortunately I can't put in a negative stars ....
title: I hate paying and not getting what I paid for

author: Lamed sheen
comment: The weather icons won't change or show the temp (stack at 100F°),the F° won't change to C°, dynamic wallpaper shows only rain picture  nothing dynamic about that. Please fix or refund.....(running Android wear 6.0.1 huawei round)
title: Paid for pro hoping to get extra features..but..its not working... Would like a refund

author: Nick Bambridge
comment: Today's weather icon and text is not consistent with the 3-day forecast so it looks bad if you have both displayed. The min/max temperature display is bulky and awkward. And the watch face itself sometimes freezes in sleep mode. Overall feels unfinished and not worth the money.
title: Needs work

author: Ryan Golding
comment: Stupid me didn't read before buying.  No weather no dynamic background....  Weather icons don't change either... Very disappointing
title: Not working

author: Jakson Badenhoop
comment: This had become my favorite watch face, providing plenty of information. Now it always shows incorrect info -- constantly reads as 100 degrees on watch!!!!!!
title: Wrong weather, all the time

author: Kevin Bonikowski
comment: I had an issue with the temp showing 100 degrees but it was fixed worth a reset.  Nice clean look.  Maybe future update could add sorry cute when touching clock or temp.
title: Not working properly

author: Harold Sohrweide
comment: But the weather portion no longer updates. Just shows the same wrong temperature all the time. No response from several support emails.
title: Was great, weather does not update

author: Pat Stewart
comment: Like the program but it says it has been 100 and raining for days.  Sure doesn't feel like it, though.
title: Always hot here.

author: John Stringer
comment: The weather forecast is stuck on sunny and 100F. I have changed it repeatedly, uninstalled and reinstalled, but no change. Pretty useless given that it is supposed to be a weather watch face.
title: I like it, but...

author: benjamin andrews
comment: App worked great until I payed for the pro version. First the background stopped dynamically changing after a day and now 2 days later the battery percentages aren't correct.
title: Don't go pro

author: Frank Antonucci
comment: Has potential, but doesn't provide accurate temps. Neither does it update changed icons. Kind of useless.
title: Not great

author: wayne foster
comment: I don't use it any more
title: This used to be the best watch face now I reckon its the worst the weather icon does not change it has stayed stuck on 100% continuously dosent matter if you restart , shut down , or uninstall it stays the spame obviously the owner dosent care.

author: Ankit Jain
comment: Used to be my favourite watch app and I bought a paid version. One fine day weather updates stopped working. Where is the developer?

reply.author: Guillermo Uzquiano Muñoz
reply.content:
Hi Ankit,

Thank you for downloading my app.

I posted a new update that should fix all problems caused.

If you're still having problems, please contact me.

regards,
Guillermo.

title: Stopped working

author: Joe D'Marco
comment: I emailed the dev, no reply. The screen remains Sunny all day. I've installed, reinstalled it. Still nothing. I've changed weather settings. Nothing. Developer has abandoned us?!
title: Auto background stopped

author: benodiktine
comment: The low temperature is 100 and the high is 999 using either weather service you can choose from. Hasn't been updated since May 3, 2015. Seems like a great watch face but apparently it's broken and no longer being updated. A real shame.
title: Weather Doesn't Work

author: Matthew Palmer
comment: Sometimes random elements don't update while others do. For instance, if I choose a different icon set the icons will update and change on the watch face, but if I choose Fahrenheit, the watch face won't update and keeps showing Celsius. I tried deleting app data and that doesn't help. Update: Now it just says it's 100C all the time.
title: Read the newest reviews before you buy.

author: venkatesh bharadwaj
comment: It used to be my favorite watch face until weather updates stopped working.  Are you planning to fix the weather update? The name of app says weather app and it does not do at all what it is supposed to do.

author: WreckCars69 n/a
comment: Weather won't update! The weather stuck on 100 degree for 3 month uninstall & reset watch nothing working just the time & battery life.
title: Weather stop working!

author: First Baptist Church of Dowling Park
comment: The temperature is stuck at a hundred degrees and the dynamic weather does not change the background. I purchase the pro version and if the problem is not fixed I'm requesting a refund.
title: Disappointed

author: michelle henley
comment: I agree with all the other ratings- weather doesn't change...stuck at 100 degrees. This isn't a weather app! Too bad cuz its nice to look at otherwise

author: Cleveland Clarke
comment: for some reason the temperature doesn't sync, which is the very reason why I downloaded it. it continually says 100 degrees. everything else syncs but the temp. may have to remove it.If I can't get it going. I give it 2 star, if it worked correctly probably a 4 or 5.

author: Nick Dunklee
comment: Battery levels are cropped off the bottom of the display. No adjustment seems to fix it other than super tiny fonts.
title: Doesn't display correctly on moto 360 anymore

author: A.J. LeClerc
comment: bought the pro version but can't add as a choosable background on my note 3 for moto 360. app shows up in phone but nothing in the gear app.
title: doesn't work

author: PAVEL MARTINAS
comment: Does not update the weather temperature .Gets stuck for days showing same temp.Will have to uninstall this.Used to be ok..
title: Not working

author: Karim Toursarkissian
comment: Fails and temperature shows 100 regardless of F or C. I would love a refund for my wasted US $ 1.30
title: ASUS Zenwatch 2

author: Michelle Stauch
comment: And it doesn't look different depending on the time of day even tho I enabled that option
title: Weather is never right

author: Dan Hart
comment: Can't get it to pull the correct weather information for my location. Tried both automatic and manual settings.
title: Doesn't work

author: Joe Keller
comment: Did a search for gear 2 apps, this one came up...bought it...should have read it all...NOT FOR GEAR 2...WHAT A JOKE
title: Not compatible

author: Brent Metz
comment: This used to be an excellent watch face. I even paid for it. The Dev doesn't support it anymore, so it slowly has stopped working due to lack of updates and bug fixes.
title: Used to be great.

author: Ivana Barros de Campos
comment: You need to pay for almost all features. I would like to use photos from my gallery for watch faces and this option is not free available. Only if I purchase the pro version.
title: It's not free

author: Dwight Reed
comment: I bought it for the weather,  but everything works except the weather.  No matter what location settings I choose it's always 100 degrees.
title: Asus zenwatch 2

author: Michael Moehlmann
comment: Showed the temp and forecast for two days then it was 90 degrees permanently. Waste of money.
title: Stopped Working

author: Mustafa Gatollari
comment: Can't load photos from my gallery. Using a Nexus 5. Want to return.
title: Ugly and cannot load photos

author: Mark
comment: Units are messed up.  Seems it's 100 degrees Celsius in Scotland lol
title: Buggy
